content: The file cannot be copied to this room. Please try to copy the {{organizationName}} PDF form.

comment.text: This translation key displays a warning message when attempting to copy a file to a form room. It indicates that the file cannot be copied due to its format (pdf) and suggests copying the organization's pdf form instead. This message appears in the Files Selector component.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "نسخ نموذج PDF الخاص بـ" (copy the PDF form belonging to) is a bit clunky. A more natural phrasing would be "نموذج PDF الخاص بـ" (the PDF form of) or "نموذج PDF لـ" (PDF form for).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: لا يمكن نسخ الملف إلى هذه الغرفة. يُرجى محاولة نسخ نموذج PDF لـ {{organizationName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation is overly literal and sounds unnatural in German. A more natural phrasing would be something like 'Die Datei lässt sich nicht in diesen Raum kopieren. Versuchen Sie bitte, das PDF-Formular von {{organizationName}} zu kopieren.'
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Die Datei lässt sich nicht in diesen Raum kopieren. Versuchen Sie bitte, das PDF-Formular von {{organizationName}} zu kopieren.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'διαγραφή' (diagrapi) means 'deletion' or 'erasure', not 'copy'. The intended meaning is 'copy'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Δεν είναι δυνατή η αντιγραφή του αρχείου σε αυτό το δωμάτιο. Δοκιμάστε να αντιγράψετε τη φόρμα PDF του {{organizationName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'sala' translates to 'room' but in this context, 'room' refers to a digital room or repository. A more accurate translation would be 'área', 'espacio', or 'contenedor'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: El archivo no se puede copiar en esta área/espacio/contenedor. Por favor, intente copiar el formulario PDF de {{organizationName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "The file cannot be copied to this room" is translated as "Ֆայլը չի կարող պատճենվել այս սենյակում". While technically correct, a more natural phrasing in Armenian might be "Ֆայլը չի կարողանում պատճենվել այս սենյակում" or "Ֆայլը հնարավոր չէ պատճենել այս սենյակում".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ֆայլը հնարավոր չէ պատճենել այս սենյակում:

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'Please try to copy the {{organizationName}} PDF form' is translated as 'Si prega di provare a copiare un modulo PDF {{organizationName}} alla volta.' The addition of 'alla volta' (one at a time) changes the meaning.  The original implies trying to copy the form, not necessarily one at a time.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Si prega di provare a copiare il modulo PDF {{organizationName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "ຖ່າຍອອກໄປ" (thay ok pai) implies copying out of somewhere, which isn't quite the intended meaning. A better phrasing would convey that it cannot be copied *to* the room.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ເອກະສານນີ້ບໍ່ສາມາດຖ່າຍໃສ່ຫ້ອງນີ້ໄດ້ (eksakan ni bo ma san thai sai hong ni dai)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While not strictly incorrect, 'ເອກະສານ' (eksakan) is a more formal term. For a warning message, 'ເອກະສານ' might sound a little stiff.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ບເອກະສານນີ້ບໍ່ສາມາດຖ່າຍໃສ່ຫ້ອງນີ້ໄດ້ (b eksakan ni bo ma san thai sai hong ni dai)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'ficheiro' is a valid Portuguese word but might be better replaced with 'arquivo' for broader understanding and consistency with common usage in this context.
The phrase 'formulário PDF {{organizationName}}' lacks proper punctuation. A hyphen should be added after 'PDF' to make it read as 'formulário PDF-{{organizationName}}'.

The phrase 'PDF form {{organizationName}} PDF form' is redundant and doesn't accurately reflect the English content. The English content refers to a specific PDF form associated with the organization.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: O arquivo não pode ser copiado para esta sala. Tente copiar o formulário PDF {{organizationName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The repetition of 'PDF' makes the sentence sound awkward in Portuguese.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: O arquivo não pode ser copiado para esta sala. Tente copiar o formulário PDF {{organizationName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence structure is slightly awkward. 'Încercați să copiați' could be improved.

The phrase "The file cannot be copied to this room" is translated accurately, but the overall phrasing feels a bit stiff and unnatural in Russian.  A more natural phrasing might incorporate a more conversational tone.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Файл не удается скопировать в эту комнату. Пожалуйста, попробуйте скопировать PDF-форму {{organizationName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, the inclusion of a space before the 'PDF-форму' is slightly less common and could be improved.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Файл не удается скопировать в эту комнату. Пожалуйста, попробуйте скопировать PDF форму {{organizationName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'Please try to copy the {{organizationName}} PDF form' is not accurately translated. A more natural Slovenian translation would be 'Poskusite kopirati PDF obrazec {{organizationName}}.' or 'Poskusite posredovati PDF obrazec {{organizationName}}'. The current translation is a bit awkward and uses 'kopirati' twice unnecessarily.
The word 'фајл' (file) is spelled correctly but might be better replaced with 'датутека' to align better with common terminology in formal contexts.
The use of 'PDF образац' is technically correct, but using 'PDF формулар' might be more common and sound more natural.
